item.title: Broadcast on 23-Jul-2014
item.description: A chat with Justin Neal, about his upcoming Vancouver Fringe show BALLS.
item.itunes:subtitle: Justin Neal BALLS

item.title: Alphabet Soup
item.description: On this week's Alphabet Soup, Sierra Skye Gemma reads and discusses her non-fiction essay about talking to her teenaged son about sexuality. Lots of swears and graphic language in this podcast, young listeners beware!
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Non-Fiction Writer Sierra Skye Gemma

item.title: Broadcast on June 11, 2014
item.description: On this week's Alphabet Soup, Sierra Skye Gemma reads and discusses her non-fiction essay about talking to her teenaged son about sexuality. Lots of swears and graphic language in this podcast, young listeners beware!
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Non-Fiction Writer Sierra Skye Gemma

item.title: Broadcast on 28-May-2014
item.description: In Alphabet Soup this week, we listen to "The Butterfly", a radio play by co-host Sarah Higgins. The premise: two siblings break into a radio station at midnight to broadcast a message to their time-travelling mother. Hijinks ensue.
item.itunes:subtitle: "The Butterfly"
